p: The synthesis of MeNPs using Artemisia spp. is becoming an important source of potential applications in many fields. In addition to widely studied properties such as antibacterial [ 184, 188, 189, 191, 202, 203], antioxidant [ 186, 188, 193, 203] and anti-cancer [ 188, 189, 203, 205], the use as nanopesticides and nanoherbicides is also being investigated, with few results being reported so far, even if Artemisia spp. are recognized to have such biological activities as well [ 104, 212, 213, 214].
